ongoing_events.summary: 🏕️2025 Kid's Summer Art Camp
ongoing_events.location: Le Petit Gan International Preschool Los Angeles, 1071 S Fairfax Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90048, USA
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR: Kids 2 - 6 years old

LOCATION: Le Petit Gan International Preschool - Los Angeles (1071 S. Fairfax Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90048)

We’re excited to have your child join us at the 2025 Kid’s Beverly Hills Summer Art Camp! Our outdoor campus fosters learning, creativity, and independence, offering a fun and educational experience.

Kids ages 3-8 will enjoy daily activities like creative crafts, painting, water play, sports, morning yoga, gardening, and science experiments, all while nourishing their bodies with organic meals. Weekly sign-ups offer flexibility for your summer travels, and your child will make lasting friendships that will last a lifetime!

Get tickets here.

Looking for 2nd half of Summer? Click Here.

Ages: 2 - 6 years

Locations: 2 Campuses (LA: Fairfax Ave & WEHO: Doheny Blvd)

Fairfax Ave (LA CAMPUS)
Address: 1071 S. Fairfax Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90048

Pricing:

$540 / Week

$4,300 / All Summer (8 Weeks: June 30th - August 21st)

Doheny Blvd (WEHO CAMPUS)
Address: 968 N. Doheny Dr. West Hollywood, CA 90069


Pricing:

$700 / Week

$5,600 / All Summer (8 Weeks: June 30th - August 21st)

*Please make sure you're selecting the correct ticket with the campus you prefer at checkout.

Summer Camp Activities Include:

-Water Play
-Daily Crafts
-Outdoor Learning
-STEM Summer Prep
-Outdoor Sports
-Gardening
-Morning Yoga
-Music and Dancing
-and so more!

Host:

Le Petit Gan International Preschool is proud to continue to provide a safe and healthy learning environment for kids 18 months - 6 years old in our West Hollywood, Los Angeles, and Beverly Hills campuses.

ongoing_events.summary: ⛺Venice Arts Summer Media Arts Camp
ongoing_events.location: Venice Arts, 13445 Beach Ave, Marina Del Rey, CA 90292, USA
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR: Youth ages 9–18.

Venice Arts is excited to welcome students back for our in-person Media Arts Summer Camp, a fun-filled and creative two-week workshop series designed for youth ages 9–18.

Participants will engage in hands-on media arts experiences, with access to professional equipment, exciting field trips, and the chance to build friendships while expressing creativity.

Session Dates:
Session 1: July 7 – July 18
Session 2: July 22 – August 1

Monday, July 7, 2025 2:30 PM — Friday, August 1, 2025 3:30 PM


Program Highlights:
Hands-on art and media projects
Use of professional cameras and equipment
Engaging field trips
A chance to make new friends
An inspiring space to build creative skills

Cost:
Free for low-income families

Lunch options are available for students attending full-day sessions.

Don't miss this opportunity to give your child an unforgettable summer filled with creativity, discovery, and connection.

Register today at: www.venicearts.org/summer-camp

Questions? Contact us at info@venice-arts.org or call (310) 392-0846

ongoing_events.summary: ☀️Spanish Immersion Summer Camp [PRE-K - 5TH GRADE]
ongoing_events.location: 9017 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90035
ongoing_events.description:
🎯BEST FOR:

  • Preschool camp: ages 2–4.5 (with prior Spanish exposure) 
  • Elementary camp: ages 4.5–11 for older kids 


Immersion Approach: 100% Spanish-speaking setting using play, project-based learning, STEAM, cultural exploration, and music—intended to develop oral fluency in real-life contexts .

Aligned with Montessori, Reggio Emilia, and IB (PYP) methodologies

📅 Weekly Themes & Dates (2025)

Preschool sessions run June–August with rotating themes—each one week long. Highlights include:

  • June 9–13: Planet Superheroes – nature, recycling, eco-stewardship
  • June 23–27: Gaudí & Barcelona (art-focused) and Asian Trip Around the World
  • June 30–July 3: South American Experience
  • July 7–11: Exploring Gravity
  • July 14–18: Forces in Action (motion sciences)
  • July 21–25: Full Speed Ahead (speed & racing elements)
  • July 28–August 1: World of Bugs (nature-themed exploration)
  • August 4–8: Central American Experience
  • August 11–15: Italy – da Vinci & Michelangelo
  • August 18–22: Splish Splash (water science & play)
🕘 Schedule & Daily Flow

Regular Day: 9:00 AM–3:00 PM

Extended Day: 8:00 AM–5:30 PM 

Daily schedule includes arrival, theme introduction, snack, STEAM or creative activity, cultural exploration/cooking/movement, lunch/free play, more games/music, and pick-up time.

Fridays often feature a special activity or field trip (elementary camp) 

💰 Pricing & Fees

Weekly Rates (Preschool):
Regular Day: $420/week
Extended Day: $480/week Intiwasi School+3Intiwasi School+3ActivityHero+3

Additional costs:

Enrollment Fee: $25
Camp Shirt: $15 (required if participating in field trips)
Field Trip or Performance Fees: Vary per week
Hot Lunch Program: Optional—$45/week Intiwasi School

Enrollment is first‑come, first‑serve, spots fill quickly .


📍 Location & Contact

Address: 9017 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035 

Email: admissions@intiwasischool.com

Phone: (424) 527‑0098

ongoing_events.summary: 🐶Wallis Annenberg PetSpace Summer Camp: PET PIONEERS
ongoing_events.location: 12005 Bluff Creek Dr Playa Vista, CA 90094 United States
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR:  Ages 7-1

Get ready for your kiddos to become Pet Pioneers during our one week summer camp experience!

Camp sessions take place Monday-Friday from 9am-2pm. Campers will take part in fun pet-centric activities that will immerse them in topics like the human-animal bond, pet adoption, veterinary care, animal behavior and much, much more!

2025 PET PIONEER SESSIONS:

  • June 16 - June 20
  • July 7 - July 11
  • July 21 - July 25
  • August 11 - August 15


PET PIONEER CAMP themes include:

  • Pet Adoption
  • Health
  • Behavior
  • Grooming
  • Nutrition
  • Exercise and Physical Therapy
  • Photography
  • Veterinary Medicine

Each day our couselors incorporate a new theme that makes the most of PetSpace's interactive indoor and ourtdoor spaces with live demonstrations from industry professionals, crafts, educational games, and more. Campers will meet a variety of pets and learn how to be responsible pet owners.

Each camper will receive:

  • PET PIONEER activity journal
  • PetSpace Kids Camp t-shirt
  • PetSpace swag
  • Camp supplies

Visit petspacecamp.org for more information and the daily schedule.

GET TICKETS HERE**

CANCELLATION POLICY

For cancellations made at least 14 days prior to the first day of camp, a 100% refund will be issued.

Cancellations made less than 14 days prior to the first day of camp will receive a 50% refund.

To cancel your camp reservation, email: camp@annenbergpetspace.org.

Please include the following information:

  • Parent/guardian name
  • Camper's name
  • Camp dates
  • Camp confirmation number
  • Phone number

Annenberg PetSpace reserves the right to cancel any program. In the event that a program is canceled, all program fees will be refunded.

LOCATION: Main Library (601 Santa Monica Blvd. Santa Monica CA 90401)

Storytime with interactive books, songs, and more. Limited space; free tickets available.

one_time_events.summary: 🪇Zoo Jam & Play Music [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Ages 6 wks - 5 years w/adult

ABOUT THE CLASS:
A fun, engaging music class for kids of all ages. In our music & play class, we will explore songs, rhymes, movement, percussion, ukulele and play with puppets, parachute, and more! An early exposure to music has a long list of benefits including early communication skills, bonding, motor skills (moving freely to music), self-expression, memory skills and so much more! Michelle & Kelci combine their love for music, children and teaching into a fun filled class! Come bond with your child and experience the joy and playfulness of what music has to offer! 
 
CLASS TIME: 45 minutes
 
BRING: Any musical instruments to play along
 
NOTES: 1 adult per child. If space available, additional families members will be charged.

**BOOK HERE**

one_time_events.summary: ✨📘STAR Storytimes with STAR Reader Kelly
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Kids


LOCATION: Mar Vista Branch Library

STAR volunteer Kelly reads to children one-on-one or in small groups. No sign-up is required. Take home a free book to keep after attending three STAR programs at our branch!

STAR storytimes are subject to change or cancellation, depending on volunteer schedules.


Foe more info:https://www.lapl.org/whats-on/events/star-reader-kelly

one_time_events.summary: 🎨Messy Art & Sensory [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: 18 months - 6 years (adult optional)

ABOUT THE CLASS:
Explore with your little artist! Children will learn about elements of art like shape, color and line while experimenting with various materials like paint, paper, glue, mixed media and colors. We focus on fine motor skills, sensory experiences, and create themed projects. Kids have fun expressing themselves creatively and take home awesome projects!

SUPPLIES INCLUDED: Small art pieces are sometimes used in class. Parent supervision is necessary for younger children please.

**BOOK HERE**

PLEASE NOTE: This class is "adult optional". If joining class with your child, we ask that you participate with your child to create a better experience for all. You are welcome to stay in the lobby, if you do not join class.



ALL CLASSES REQUIRE 1 PARENT/CAREGIVER TO REMAIN AT THE STUDIO AT ALL TIMES, PLEASE.

one_time_events.summary: 🧸🧘Yogi Bears Yoga [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: 2 - 6 years (adult optional)

ABOUT THIS CLASS:
A ZOOGA YOGA® signature class! Come with us on an imaginative yoga adventure around the world. Little Yogis will develop their focus, strength, flexibility and coordination in this fun, ACTIVE themed yoga class. Kids practice the basics of a real yoga routine through the use of playful yoga games, easy yoga postures, our very own Zooga music, our interactive ANIMAL WALL and custom yoga mats. Students also learn breathing, meditation and visualization techniques, a sense of self and respect for others in our fun, positive environment. All skill and experience levels welcome, join at any time.

CLASS TIME: 45 minutes

PLEASE NOTE: This class is "adult optional". If joining class with your child, we ask that you participate with your child to create a better experience for all. You are welcome to stay in the lobby, if you do not join class.

**BOOK HERE**


ALL CLASSES REQUIRE 1 PARENT/CAREGIVER TO REMAIN AT THE STUDIO AT ALL TIMES, PLEASE.

one_time_events.summary: 🖼️Personalized Photo Frames Craft Session at Mar Vista Library
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Kids, Teens, and Families.

Get creative and make memories! Join us for a fun, hands-on Personalized Photo Frames craft session at the Mar Vista Library.

🗓️ Date: Monday, July 21
⏰ Time: 4:00 PM
📍 Location: Mar Vista Library,  12006 Venice Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90066

Design and decorate your very own photo frame to take home, perfect for showcasing a favorite summer moment! All materials are provided, and this event is great for kids, teens, and families.

✨ No registration needed. Just bring your creativity and we’ll supply the rest!

We can’t wait to see your masterpiece! 🖼️🎉

one_time_events.summary: 🐼🧘Mighty Pandas Yoga & Mindfulness [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Ages 7-14 years (parent optional)

ABOUT THE CLASS:
Experience a signature class from ZOOGA YOGA®! Our Mighty Pandas class is designed to help older yogis cultivate focus, strength, self-esteem, mindfulness, and coordination in a supportive environment. We encourage yogis to connect with their breath, push their boundaries, and build confidence through movement. These thoughtfully crafted classes are inspired by empowering quotes, music, and yoga principles. Explore deeper self-awareness in our parent-optional, multi-level class. Enhance your balance, strength, and flexibility while learning to move with intention and discover inner peace. This class is open to all skill levels, from athletes to beginners. Feel free to join at any time and start your yoga journey.

CLASS TIME: 45 minutes

PLEASE BRING: Yoga mat

NOTE (Parents): Please do not leave studio without checking with the front desk first.

**BOOK HERE**

ongoing_events.summary: 🏕️2025 Kid's Summer Art Camp
ongoing_events.location: Le Petit Gan International Preschool Los Angeles, 1071 S Fairfax Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90048, USA
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR: Kids 2 - 6 years old

LOCATION: Le Petit Gan International Preschool - Los Angeles (1071 S. Fairfax Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90048)

We’re excited to have your child join us at the 2025 Kid’s Beverly Hills Summer Art Camp! Our outdoor campus fosters learning, creativity, and independence, offering a fun and educational experience.

Kids ages 3-8 will enjoy daily activities like creative crafts, painting, water play, sports, morning yoga, gardening, and science experiments, all while nourishing their bodies with organic meals. Weekly sign-ups offer flexibility for your summer travels, and your child will make lasting friendships that will last a lifetime!

Get tickets here.

ongoing_events.location: Venice Arts, 13445 Beach Ave, Marina Del Rey, CA 90292, USA
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR: Youth ages 9–18.

Venice Arts is excited to welcome students back for our in-person Media Arts Summer Camp, a fun-filled and creative two-week workshop series designed for youth ages 9–18.

Participants will engage in hands-on media arts experiences, with access to professional equipment, exciting field trips, and the chance to build friendships while expressing creativity.

Session Dates:
Session 1: July 7 – July 18
Session 2: July 22 – August 1

Monday, July 7, 2025 2:30 PM — Friday, August 1, 2025 3:30 PM


Program Highlights:
Hands-on art and media projects
Use of professional cameras and equipment
Engaging field trips
A chance to make new friends
An inspiring space to build creative skills

Cost:
Free for low-income families

Lunch options are available for students attending full-day sessions.

Don't miss this opportunity to give your child an unforgettable summer filled with creativity, discovery, and connection.

Register today at: www.venicearts.org/summer-camp

Questions? Contact us at info@venice-arts.org or call (310) 392-0846

GET READY TO HOOP IT UP!
Our 3-on-3 basketball tournament is open to all club members who love the game.

Whether you sign up with your friends or by yourself, we’ll make sure everyone gets on a team!

Each session is 2 hours long and full of fun, competition, and teamwork. You’ll learn about sportsmanship, hustle, and what it means to be a great teammate — all while playing the game you love.

At the end of every session, we’ll crown a champion team!

ongoing_events.summary: ☀️Spanish Immersion Summer Camp [PRE-K - 5TH GRADE]
ongoing_events.location: 9017 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90035
ongoing_events.description:
🎯BEST FOR:

  • Preschool camp: ages 2–4.5 (with prior Spanish exposure) 
  • Elementary camp: ages 4.5–11 for older kids 


Immersion Approach: 100% Spanish-speaking setting using play, project-based learning, STEAM, cultural exploration, and music—intended to develop oral fluency in real-life contexts .

Aligned with Montessori, Reggio Emilia, and IB (PYP) methodologies

📅 Weekly Themes & Dates (2025)

Preschool sessions run June–August with rotating themes—each one week long. Highlights include:

  • June 9–13: Planet Superheroes – nature, recycling, eco-stewardship
  • June 23–27: Gaudí & Barcelona (art-focused) and Asian Trip Around the World
  • June 30–July 3: South American Experience
  • July 7–11: Exploring Gravity
  • July 14–18: Forces in Action (motion sciences)
  • July 21–25: Full Speed Ahead (speed & racing elements)
  • July 28–August 1: World of Bugs (nature-themed exploration)
  • August 4–8: Central American Experience
  • August 11–15: Italy – da Vinci & Michelangelo
  • August 18–22: Splish Splash (water science & play)
🕘 Schedule & Daily Flow

Regular Day: 9:00 AM–3:00 PM

Extended Day: 8:00 AM–5:30 PM 

Daily schedule includes arrival, theme introduction, snack, STEAM or creative activity, cultural exploration/cooking/movement, lunch/free play, more games/music, and pick-up time.

Fridays often feature a special activity or field trip (elementary camp) 

💰 Pricing & Fees

Regular Day: $420/week
Extended Day: $480/week Intiwasi School+3Intiwasi School+3ActivityHero+3

Additional costs:

Enrollment Fee: $25
Camp Shirt: $15 (required if participating in field trips)
Field Trip or Performance Fees: Vary per week
Hot Lunch Program: Optional—$45/week Intiwasi School

Enrollment is first‑come, first‑serve, spots fill quickly .

ongoing_events.summary: ☀️Spanish Immersion Summer Camp [PRE-K - 5TH GRADE]
ongoing_events.location: 9017 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90035
ongoing_events.description:
🎯BEST FOR:

  • Preschool camp: ages 2–4.5 (with prior Spanish exposure) 
  • Elementary camp: ages 4.5–11 for older kids 


Immersion Approach: 100% Spanish-speaking setting using play, project-based learning, STEAM, cultural exploration, and music—intended to develop oral fluency in real-life contexts .

Aligned with Montessori, Reggio Emilia, and IB (PYP) methodologies

📅 Weekly Themes & Dates (2025)

Preschool sessions run June–August with rotating themes—each one week long. Highlights include:

  • June 9–13: Planet Superheroes – nature, recycling, eco-stewardship
  • June 23–27: Gaudí & Barcelona (art-focused) and Asian Trip Around the World
  • June 30–July 3: South American Experience
  • July 7–11: Exploring Gravity
  • July 14–18: Forces in Action (motion sciences)
  • July 21–25: Full Speed Ahead (speed & racing elements)
  • July 28–August 1: World of Bugs (nature-themed exploration)
  • August 4–8: Central American Experience
  • August 11–15: Italy – da Vinci & Michelangelo
  • August 18–22: Splish Splash (water science & play)
🕘 Schedule & Daily Flow

Regular Day: 9:00 AM–3:00 PM

Extended Day: 8:00 AM–5:30 PM 

Daily schedule includes arrival, theme introduction, snack, STEAM or creative activity, cultural exploration/cooking/movement, lunch/free play, more games/music, and pick-up time.

Fridays often feature a special activity or field trip (elementary camp) 

💰 Pricing & Fees

Weekly Rates (Preschool):
Regular Day: $420/week
Extended Day: $480/week Intiwasi School+3Intiwasi School+3ActivityHero+3

Additional costs:

Enrollment Fee: $25
Camp Shirt: $15 (required if participating in field trips)
Field Trip or Performance Fees: Vary per week
Hot Lunch Program: Optional—$45/week Intiwasi School

Enrollment is first‑come, first‑serve, spots fill quickly .


📍 Location & Contact

Address: 9017 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035 

Email: admissions@intiwasischool.com

Phone: (424) 527‑0098

ongoing_events.summary: 🐶Wallis Annenberg PetSpace Summer Camp: PET PIONEERS
ongoing_events.location: 12005 Bluff Creek Dr Playa Vista, CA 90094 United States
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR:  Ages 7-1

Get ready for your kiddos to become Pet Pioneers during our one week summer camp experience!

Camp sessions take place Monday-Friday from 9am-2pm. Campers will take part in fun pet-centric activities that will immerse them in topics like the human-animal bond, pet adoption, veterinary care, animal behavior and much, much more!

2025 PET PIONEER SESSIONS:

  • June 16 - June 20
  • July 7 - July 11
  • July 21 - July 25
  • August 11 - August 15


PET PIONEER CAMP themes include:

  • Pet Adoption
  • Health
  • Behavior
  • Grooming
  • Nutrition
  • Exercise and Physical Therapy
  • Photography
  • Veterinary Medicine

Each day our couselors incorporate a new theme that makes the most of PetSpace's interactive indoor and ourtdoor spaces with live demonstrations from industry professionals, crafts, educational games, and more. Campers will meet a variety of pets and learn how to be responsible pet owners.

Each camper will receive:

  • PET PIONEER activity journal
  • PetSpace Kids Camp t-shirt
  • PetSpace swag
  • Camp supplies

Visit petspacecamp.org for more information and the daily schedule.

GET TICKETS HERE**

CANCELLATION POLICY

For cancellations made at least 14 days prior to the first day of camp, a 100% refund will be issued.

Cancellations made less than 14 days prior to the first day of camp will receive a 50% refund.

To cancel your camp reservation, email: camp@annenbergpetspace.org.

Please include the following information:

  • Parent/guardian name
  • Camper's name
  • Camp dates
  • Camp confirmation number
  • Phone number

Annenberg PetSpace reserves the right to cancel any program. In the event that a program is canceled, all program fees will be refunded.

ongoing_events.summary: ☀️Spanish Immersion Summer Camp [PRE-K - 5TH GRADE]
ongoing_events.location: 9017 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90035
ongoing_events.description:
🎯BEST FOR:

  • Preschool camp: ages 2–4.5 (with prior Spanish exposure) 
  • Elementary camp: ages 4.5–11 for older kids 


Immersion Approach: 100% Spanish-speaking setting using play, project-based learning, STEAM, cultural exploration, and music—intended to develop oral fluency in real-life contexts .

Aligned with Montessori, Reggio Emilia, and IB (PYP) methodologies

📅 Weekly Themes & Dates (2025)

Preschool sessions run June–August with rotating themes—each one week long. Highlights include:

  • June 9–13: Planet Superheroes – nature, recycling, eco-stewardship
  • June 23–27: Gaudí & Barcelona (art-focused) and Asian Trip Around the World
  • June 30–July 3: South American Experience
  • July 7–11: Exploring Gravity
  • July 14–18: Forces in Action (motion sciences)
  • July 21–25: Full Speed Ahead (speed & racing elements)
  • July 28–August 1: World of Bugs (nature-themed exploration)
  • August 4–8: Central American Experience
  • August 11–15: Italy – da Vinci & Michelangelo
  • August 18–22: Splish Splash (water science & play)
🕘 Schedule & Daily Flow

Regular Day: 9:00 AM–3:00 PM

Extended Day: 8:00 AM–5:30 PM 

Daily schedule includes arrival, theme introduction, snack, STEAM or creative activity, cultural exploration/cooking/movement, lunch/free play, more games/music, and pick-up time.

Fridays often feature a special activity or field trip (elementary camp) 

💰 Pricing & Fees

Weekly Rates (Preschool):
Regular Day: $420/week
Extended Day: $480/week Intiwasi School+3Intiwasi School+3ActivityHero+3

Additional costs:

Enrollment Fee: $25
Camp Shirt: $15 (required if participating in field trips)
Field Trip or Performance Fees: Vary per week
Hot Lunch Program: Optional—$45/week Intiwasi School

Enrollment is first‑come, first‑serve, spots fill quickly .


📍 Location & Contact

Address: 9017 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035 

Email: admissions@intiwasischool.com

Phone: (424) 527‑0098

ongoing_events.summary: 🐶Wallis Annenberg PetSpace Summer Camp: PET PIONEERS
ongoing_events.location: 12005 Bluff Creek Dr Playa Vista, CA 90094 United States
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR:  Ages 7-1

Get ready for your kiddos to become Pet Pioneers during our one week summer camp experience!

Camp sessions take place Monday-Friday from 9am-2pm. Campers will take part in fun pet-centric activities that will immerse them in topics like the human-animal bond, pet adoption, veterinary care, animal behavior and much, much more!

2025 PET PIONEER SESSIONS:

  • June 16 - June 20
  • July 7 - July 11
  • July 21 - July 25
  • August 11 - August 15


PET PIONEER CAMP themes include:

  • Pet Adoption
  • Health
  • Behavior
  • Grooming
  • Nutrition
  • Exercise and Physical Therapy
  • Photography
  • Veterinary Medicine

Each day our couselors incorporate a new theme that makes the most of PetSpace's interactive indoor and ourtdoor spaces with live demonstrations from industry professionals, crafts, educational games, and more. Campers will meet a variety of pets and learn how to be responsible pet owners.

Each camper will receive:

  • PET PIONEER activity journal
  • PetSpace Kids Camp t-shirt
  • PetSpace swag
  • Camp supplies

Visit petspacecamp.org for more information and the daily schedule.

GET TICKETS HERE**

CANCELLATION POLICY

For cancellations made at least 14 days prior to the first day of camp, a 100% refund will be issued.

Cancellations made less than 14 days prior to the first day of camp will receive a 50% refund.

To cancel your camp reservation, email: camp@annenbergpetspace.org.

Please include the following information:

  • Parent/guardian name
  • Camper's name
  • Camp dates
  • Camp confirmation number
  • Phone number

Annenberg PetSpace reserves the right to cancel any program. In the event that a program is canceled, all program fees will be refunded.

one_time_events.summary: 🤹‍♀️Club Joyful Gummy Loves Sensory Classes
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: aged infant to 3.  
LOCATION:  2121 Lincoln Blvd Venice CA 90291  

Our sensory class is designed for curious little ones, ages 1-3, who love to touch, squish, splash, and uncover the world around them. Each session will have a theme and be filled with playful, hands-on activities that spark creativity, encourage movement, and support early development.

From fluffy foam to colorful rice, gentle music to calming lights, your child will delight in discovering new textures, sounds, and sensations. Parents, we encourage you to play, supervise and spend quality time with your inquisitive explorers. 

Come join the fun—where learning feels like play, and every sense is invited to the party! 

Thursdays at 9:30am

$37 Single Class / Discounted Class Packs available at check out
*Or consider joining as a Club Member

Join Class here: https://www.clubjoyful.com/classes-events/sensory-classes

one_time_events.summary: 🎼Zoo Jam Music Class [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: 6 weeks - 5 years with adult

ABOUT THE CLASS:
Come sing, laugh and giggle with your baby in a high energy, fun environment that encourages improvisation and playfulness. Sing childhood favs, wave colorful scarves, dance to an array of musical styles and play with our shakers and rhythm props to nurture a life long love of music while fostering social skills and enhancing coordination. The SMILES ARE INFECTIOUS!

CLASS TIME: 45 minutes

BRING: Any musical instruments to play along

NOTES: 1 adult per child. If space, extra adults are an additional fee.

**BOOK HERE**

one_time_events.summary: 🎭🎬Storybook Theater & Movement [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Ages 18 mths - 5 years + adult optional

ABOUT THE CLASS:
In Zooga's Storybook Theater & Dance class, our mini actors-in-training learn fun warm-up techniques and choreography to act out their favorite tales! This playful classes include storytelling, dancing, and creative movement to bring each story to life. Join us for this fun, skills-building class and let your kid's imagination run wild!

CLASS TIME: 45 minutes

PLEASE NOTE: This class is "adult optional". If joining class with your child, we ask that you participate with your child to create a better experience for all. You are welcome to stay in the lobby, if you do not join class.


ALL CLASSES REQUIRE 1 PARENT/CAREGIVER TO REMAIN AT THE STUDIO AT ALL TIMES, PLEASE.

**BOOK HERE**

Thursday, July 24, 2025
Monday, July 28, 2025
Thursday, July 31, 2025
Monday, August 04, 2025
Monday, August 11, 2025
Monday, August 18, 2025

Join our fun Summer book club featuring different books with important themes for ages 6 and 7. Each meeting will include a book reading and a fun activity!

ongoing_events.summary: ☀️Spanish Immersion Summer Camp [PRE-K - 5TH GRADE]
ongoing_events.location: 9017 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90035
ongoing_events.description:
🎯BEST FOR:

  • Preschool camp: ages 2–4.5 (with prior Spanish exposure) 
  • Elementary camp: ages 4.5–11 for older kids 


Immersion Approach: 100% Spanish-speaking setting using play, project-based learning, STEAM, cultural exploration, and music—intended to develop oral fluency in real-life contexts .

Aligned with Montessori, Reggio Emilia, and IB (PYP) methodologies

📅 Weekly Themes & Dates (2025)

Preschool sessions run June–August with rotating themes—each one week long. Highlights include:

  • June 9–13: Planet Superheroes – nature, recycling, eco-stewardship
  • June 23–27: Gaudí & Barcelona (art-focused) and Asian Trip Around the World
  • June 30–July 3: South American Experience
  • July 7–11: Exploring Gravity
  • July 14–18: Forces in Action (motion sciences)
  • July 21–25: Full Speed Ahead (speed & racing elements)
  • July 28–August 1: World of Bugs (nature-themed exploration)
  • August 4–8: Central American Experience
  • August 11–15: Italy – da Vinci & Michelangelo
  • August 18–22: Splish Splash (water science & play)
🕘 Schedule & Daily Flow

Regular Day: 9:00 AM–3:00 PM

Extended Day: 8:00 AM–5:30 PM 

Daily schedule includes arrival, theme introduction, snack, STEAM or creative activity, cultural exploration/cooking/movement, lunch/free play, more games/music, and pick-up time.

Fridays often feature a special activity or field trip (elementary camp) 

💰 Pricing & Fees

Weekly Rates (Preschool):
Regular Day: $420/week
Extended Day: $480/week Intiwasi School+3Intiwasi School+3ActivityHero+3

Additional costs:

Enrollment Fee: $25
Camp Shirt: $15 (required if participating in field trips)
Field Trip or Performance Fees: Vary per week
Hot Lunch Program: Optional—$45/week Intiwasi School

Enrollment is first‑come, first‑serve, spots fill quickly .


📍 Location & Contact

Address: 9017 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035 

Email: admissions@intiwasischool.com

Phone: (424) 527‑0098

ongoing_events.summary: 🐶Wallis Annenberg PetSpace Summer Camp: PET PIONEERS
ongoing_events.location: 12005 Bluff Creek Dr Playa Vista, CA 90094 United States
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR:  Ages 7-1

Get ready for your kiddos to become Pet Pioneers during our one week summer camp experience!

Camp sessions take place Monday-Friday from 9am-2pm. Campers will take part in fun pet-centric activities that will immerse them in topics like the human-animal bond, pet adoption, veterinary care, animal behavior and much, much more!

2025 PET PIONEER SESSIONS:

  • June 16 - June 20
  • July 7 - July 11
  • July 21 - July 25
  • August 11 - August 15


PET PIONEER CAMP themes include:

  • Pet Adoption
  • Health
  • Behavior
  • Grooming
  • Nutrition
  • Exercise and Physical Therapy
  • Photography
  • Veterinary Medicine

Each day our couselors incorporate a new theme that makes the most of PetSpace's interactive indoor and ourtdoor spaces with live demonstrations from industry professionals, crafts, educational games, and more. Campers will meet a variety of pets and learn how to be responsible pet owners.

Each camper will receive:

  • PET PIONEER activity journal
  • PetSpace Kids Camp t-shirt
  • PetSpace swag
  • Camp supplies

Visit petspacecamp.org for more information and the daily schedule.

GET TICKETS HERE**

CANCELLATION POLICY

For cancellations made at least 14 days prior to the first day of camp, a 100% refund will be issued.

Cancellations made less than 14 days prior to the first day of camp will receive a 50% refund.

To cancel your camp reservation, email: camp@annenbergpetspace.org.

  • Parent/guardian name

one_time_events.summary: ♪♫ MooMoo Musica Tuesday Kids Classes at Electric Lodge
one_time_events.location: 1416 Electric Ave at Milwood in Venice, CA 9029
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Babies and Children up to age 5

Moo Moo Musica is a joyful, multicultural music and movement program that sparks creativity, connection, and fun for children and families. Inspired by founder JulieAnne’s vibrant childhood memories and therapeutic work with families, this one-of-a-kind class offers a heartwarming space where both kids and parents can sing, dance, and grow together—come join the rhythm!

CLASS SCHEDULE at the Electric Lodge:

Tuesdays 9:30 -11 am
Fridays 9 -11 am
Instructor: Julie Anne Searles, LMFT 

As always...Come to any class. Just show up! 

No need to pre-register.

You have 1 full year to complete any series.   

Arrive when it's best for you and your little one... and stay as long as you like!♪♫~

Never experienced a Moo class before?
 Then your first class is FREE!

Classes are $25 per single class per family:
or purchase a SERIES:
4 classes - $85
8 classes - $155
15 classes - $265

Cash, check, Zelle or Venmo
You have a year to complete any series !


Please note: FREE ON-SITE PARKING!
If the Valet asks... just tell them you're going to Moo Moo Musica and it will always be FREE!
(includes 1 hour before & after class as well)

one_time_events.summary: 🐒🧘Little Monkeys Yoga Class [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: 18 months - 3 years + adult

ABOUT THE CLASS:
A ZOOGA YOGA® signature class! Come with us on a YogaPlay® adventure. Bond with your little one as they develop their coordination, confidence, mindfulness, balance and the mind-body connection in our playful environment. FUN animal yoga poses, play using our trademark animal wall, custom mats and games, breathing techniques, silly partner poses and exciting music will have you and your child smiling from ear to ear. All skill and experience levels welcome, join at any time. Kids must be walkers to participate fully. One adult per child. Extra adults $5.


CLASS TIME: 45 minutes
 
ALL CLASSES REQUIRE 1 PARENT/CAREGIVER TO REMAIN AT THE STUDIO AT ALL TIMES, PLEASE.

**BOOK HERE**

one_time_events.description:

ABOUT THE CLASS:
Zoo Gym will help your little one work on motor skills, coordination, balance and basic acrobatics skills, all while incorporating fun acro poses and focus. Tots will gain skills with the use of balance beams, hula hoops, obstacle courses, mindful movement and more! No experience necessary.

one_time_events.summary: 🤰Pre/Post Natal Yoga [Zooga Culver City Studio]
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Moms

PRE/POST NATAL YOGA (expecting & postpartum mommas)
This is a feel good yoga class designed for pre and post natal mommas to support their journey in pregnancy, postpartum, and beyond. Strengthen mind, body and spirit, practice yoga postures, relaxation techniques and breathing exercises to help relieve common discomforts. In addition, you’ll practice abdominal and pelvic floor toning to enhance postnatal recovery. 


*Safe for moms in all trimesters and postpartum (upon medical approval). For expecting and postpartum moms only. No children allowed, please. Class is 45 minutes

**BOOK HERE**

one_time_events.summary: ⏹️LEGO Build and Play [Venice Library]
one_time_events.location: Venice - Abbot Kinney Memorial Branch Library, 501 S Venice Blvd, Venice, CA 90291, USA
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Age 5-11

LEGO Build and Play at the Abbot Kinney Memorial Branch (501 S. Venice Blvd) meets every last Friday of the month.  

You can free build with thousands of bricks, or tip over a Random Cup to complete the monthly challenge. Bring a brick or minifigure to trade with us. First time participants get a custom button pin so you can show your library love.

It's a fun, monthly, community‑focused event perfect for building social skills, creativity, and enjoying the shared joy of play with LEGO.

No registration required and no cost—just bring your imagination and join in!

Lego Club.png

For ADA accommodations, call (213) 228-7430 at least 72 hours prior to the event.

ongoing_events.summary: ⛺Venice Arts Summer Media Arts Camp
ongoing_events.location: Venice Arts, 13445 Beach Ave, Marina Del Rey, CA 90292, USA
ongoing_events.description:
BEST FOR: Youth ages 9–18.

Venice Arts is excited to welcome students back for our in-person Media Arts Summer Camp, a fun-filled and creative two-week workshop series designed for youth ages 9–18.

Participants will engage in hands-on media arts experiences, with access to professional equipment, exciting field trips, and the chance to build friendships while expressing creativity.

Session Dates:
Session 1: July 7 – July 18
Session 2: July 22 – August 1

Monday, July 7, 2025 2:30 PM — Friday, August 1, 2025 3:30 PM


Program Highlights:
Hands-on art and media projects
Use of professional cameras and equipment
Engaging field trips
A chance to make new friends
An inspiring space to build creative skills

Cost:
Free for low-income families

Lunch options are available for students attending full-day sessions.

Don't miss this opportunity to give your child an unforgettable summer filled with creativity, discovery, and connection.

Register today at: www.venicearts.org/summer-camp

Questions? Contact us at info@venice-arts.org or call (310) 392-0846

Explore with your little artist! Children will learn about elements of art like shape, color and line while experimenting with various materials like paint, paper, glue, mixed media and colors. We focus on fine motor skills, sensory experiences, and create themed projects. Kids have fun expressing themselves creatively and take home awesome projects!

one_time_events.summary: 🧘👪Family Zooga Yoga Class
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: walkers - 8 years with adult


ABOUT THE CLASS: The ultimate ZOOGA YOGA® signature class! Yoga is a fun, joyful and peaceful way for families to move together mindfully. This class is an introduction to yoga with an adventure theme that focuses on FUN AND FAMILY! We begin by focusing and tuning-in, followed by a playful practice that includes animal poses, partner poses, music, games and laughs. Class ends with guided imagery and relaxation (savasana). While our adventures are centered around the kids, adults will get a good stretch too! Anyone can do it and everyone will enjoy it.
 
CLASS TIME: 45 minutes
 
BRING: Yoga mat for adults
 
NOTES: 1 adult per child. Babies in arms are no charge. If space available, additional family members will be charged.

**Check calendar and book here**

Step into a wild adventure with Mini Ninjas, where children can unleash their inner animals in a fun and energetic environment! one_time_events.summary: 📚Children's Book World's Middle Grade Book Club for Kids & Parents
one_time_events.location: 10580 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, California 90064
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: 4th-7th grade and Parents

Every Saturday at 12:30pm in July & August!

We are so excited to bring you our brand new Middle Grade Book Club for readers in 4th-7th grade and their parents.

Hosted by CBW manager & 2024 National Book Award for Young People's Literature chair, Brein Lopez!

Join us at Children's Book World on Saturdays at 12:30pm from July thru August to talk together about our favorite middle grade books.

Parents & kids can read their books separately or together and then join us to share about the book with other families. 

Come meet new friends, and discover a new favorite book!

This club is FREE and you can attend as much or as little as works for your family. Choose your own book from home, the library, or the bookstore.

one_time_events.summary: 🧘 Family Zooga Yoga Class
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: walkers - 8 years with adult


ABOUT THE CLASS: The ultimate ZOOGA YOGA® signature class! Yoga is a fun, joyful and peaceful way for families to move together mindfully. This class is an introduction to yoga with an adventure theme that focuses on FUN AND FAMILY! We begin by focusing and tuning-in, followed by a playful practice that includes animal poses, partner poses, music, games and laughs. Class ends with guided imagery and relaxation (savasana). While our adventures are centered around the kids, adults will get a good stretch too! Anyone can do it and everyone will enjoy it.
 
CLASS TIME: 45 minutes
 
BRING: Yoga mat for adults
 
NOTES: 1 adult per child. Babies in arms are no charge. If space available, additional family members will be charged.


**Check calendar and book here**

one_time_events.summary: 🩰STORYBOOK BALLET DANCE
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Ages 2 1/2-5 1/2 years + adult optional

ABOUT THE CLASS:


A ZOOGA YOGA® signature class! Give your dancers a ballet experience in a yoga environment. Dancers embark on a journey through warm-up exercises, barre & center work and creative movement, all intertwined with captivating storytelling through dance. 

Our class incorporates enchanting props such as tutus, butterfly wings, colorful scarves and tiaras. Designed to be beginner-friendly, this lively session encourages children to nurture their creative instincts and express themselves individually through the magic of ballet and timeless Disney melodies! 


CLASS TIME: 45 minutes
*This class is adult optional, so we ask that you try to give your tots some time to try class independently.

*(SUNDAY CLASS) We periodically invite parents and friends to join us for performances @ the studio after class.
 
WHAT TO BRING: Dance shoes are not required, although ballet shoes are recommended.
 
PLEASE NOTE: This class is "adult optional". If joining class with your child, we ask that you participate with your child to create a better experience for all. You are welcome to stay in the lobby, if you do not join class.
 
ALL CLASSES REQUIRE 1 PARENT/CAREGIVER TO REMAIN AT THE STUDIO AT ALL TIMES, PLEASE.


**BOOK HERE**

one_time_events.summary: 🎨🍷Paint & Sip at Roosterfish Bar
one_time_events.location: 1302 Abbot Kinney Boulevard Venice, CA 90291 United States
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR: Family/All ages

Gather your friends for a Sunday Funday filled with creativity and fun!


🎨 When & Where: Held every last Sunday of the month, typically from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM at Roosterfish, a craft cocktail bar on Abbot Kinney Blvd.

🍷 What to Expect: Our expert instructor will guide you through a unique painting experience while you sip on refreshing cocktails, wine, and a variety of drinks. Indulge in delicious appetizers and enjoy a vibrant, artistic atmosphere, perfect for unwinding and making unforgettable memories!

💵 Price: Tickets generally run around $60–66 per person, and pre-registration is required, with a no-refund policy .
💰 RSVP required --> https://www.eventbrite.com/e/roosterfish-paint-sip-tickets-1341299335419

    It’s a creative, social, and relaxed experience, perfect for groups of friends or a laid-back way to spend your Sunday afternoon. 

    Free venue parking
